laboratory_examinations.findings: All results within normal limits; Procalcitonin and c-reactive protein were negative. ELISA test showed anti BP-180 antibodies: 12 U/mL (normal values < 20 U/mL).

No active infection with rubella virus, enteric cytopathic human orphan (ECHO) virus, coxsackievirus, cytomegalovirus, Epstein-Barr virus, herpes simplex virus 1 and 2, HIV 1 and 2, and toxoplasma gondii.
Negative anti BP-180 and anti BP-230 antibodies, and normal leukocyte formula.
